headline.main: VICHY MAPS PLAN OF IDENTITY CARDS; In Near Future All French Citizens Above Age of 15 Will Have to Carry One

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Oct. 21 -- In the near future all French citizens above the age of 15 will be compelled to carry a uniform identity card that is intended, to serve many ends.
abstract: all over 15 to carry uniform identity card; vocational census discussed
snippet: VICHY, France, Oct. 21 -- In the near future all French citizens above the age of 15 will be compelled to carry a uniform identity card that is intended, to serve many ends....

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
